title: Insurance Code
context: [ยง431:10E-124] Use of inquiries and other information. An insurer shall not refuse to issue, refuse to renew, or cancel a homeowners insurance policy, or establish rates for coverage based in whole or in part on inquiries made by any consumer to an insurer, unless the inquiry provides information not previously disclosed by the insured. [L 2012, c 80, pt of ยง1]
